T02D2067:156b-1: bh'u ti sunda ri s'a dha nam /
T02D2067:156b-4: aom shr'i ma h'a bh'u ta ku la sunda ri h'um /
T02D2067:156b-6: chu gnyis phrad pa la tsandan gyi mandala byas te /
T02D2067:156b-7: me tog gtor nas gu gul gyi dud pas bdugs te sdong phrag brgyad bzlas /
T02D2067:156b-8: yang mtshan mo stong phrag gcig bzlas pas nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2067:156b-9: nub mo 'dod yon byin pas chung mar 'gyur bas
T02D2067:156b-10: tho rangs gser srang brgya byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur
T02D2067:156b-11: ro // de bzhin du nyi ma re re byas
T02D2067:156b-12: pas zla ba gcig rdzogs pa'i rjes la cho ga
T02D2067:156b-13: ji ltar bzlas pas rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro
